channel.title: 甜品 on Xiaolin's Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in 甜品 on Xiaolin's Cookbook

item.title: 蔓越莓核桃欧包
item.description: Ingredients 250g bread flour 15g sugar a pinch of salt 150g water 3g yeast a small spoon of oil dried cranberry and toasted walnuts Directions Mix all ingredients together Rest for 30 minutes Fold Rest for another 30 minutes Fold Rest for another 60 minutes Shape the dough as desired Preheat the oven to 400(F) degrees Bake for 25 mins

item.title: Busque Cheesecake
item.description: Ingredients 250g cream cheese 60g sugar A pinch of salt 2 eggs 150g heavy cream 1 tsp vanilla extract 5g flour Directions Put all ingredients in a mixer and mix on medium speed until fully combined and smooth Set on a baking sheet inside a cake pan. Preheat the oven to 444(F) degrees Bake for 30 minutes Let the cheesecake cool in the pan at room temperature for 3 hours

item.title: 蛋挞
item.description: Ingredients 1 egg 1 egg yolk 60g milk 70g heavy cream 20g sugar Directions Defrost the pastry crust(蛋挞皮) in the room for 20mins Mix the ingredients and fill the crust Preheat the oven to 450(F) degrees Bake for 15mins Rest to room temperature
